thread.title: Malaysia shuts schools for 2 days as smog worsens
thread.title_full: Malaysia shuts schools for 2 days as smog worsens

title: Malaysia shuts schools for 2 days as smog worsens
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Malaysia has shut most schools nationwide for two days to protect children from a thick noxious haze caused by smoke from burning forests in...
